Comments_List: I learned so much about film and video, from the technical skills of software and editing to working cameras, angles, lighting, etc. This was my first time taking an art course and it was extremely helpful.
This course was great. We really learned by doing. I was also blessed with a great group of fellow students.
Really useful to get some more hands-on experience and time with Premiere and learning lighting and sound techniques.
If you have any interest in visual art, take this course. It was very fun and you learn a lot about not just video but art in general.
Absolutely, Its an amazing course designed to help students hone their videography/ story telling skills.
